description:
Fabian wanted to do another video, and I really liked his big dick, so wanted to get him back to showcase it.
He contacted me to do an Edge video, and I went over what it all entailed. He seemed to have pretty narrow limits, so I thought I may as well do it since it sounded just like a bondage oral video with a little bit of play.
So this is a more "pure" Edge video with not quite as much whacky Fantasy elements.
Still, I really like the ending as he was super easy to make nut. I think from when I say, "You ready to nut?" to him coming, it is like under a minute.
Some jerking, twisting and oral/hand movement, and he was busting in no time flat!
He must have really been on the Edge the entire time!
title: Bryan & Fabian - Edge
